articles.author: ADITHI RAMAKRISHNAN
articles.title: October’s ‘ring of fire’ solar eclipse will dazzle parts of South America and the Pacific - The Associated Press
articles.description: A “ring of fire" eclipse of the sun will cross the Pacific and the tips of Argentina and Chile. During Wednesday's annular solar eclipse, the moon will obscure all but a ring-shaped sliver of the sun. A partial eclipse will be visible at several locations inc…
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) A ring of fire eclipse of the sun is coming. But only a lucky few will be in the path. 
The annular solar eclipsewill be visible Wednesday over Easter Island and the tips of Argentina … [+2751 chars]
